Sentencas: LaNb1-xMxO4+delta (M = W, Mo) which adopts a modulated tetragonal scheelite type structure exhibits enormous potential as an electrolyte material for solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Effect of W and Mo co-substitution on conductivity and structure of LaNbO4

Sentencas: Here we report the solid-state synthesis of a series of W/Mo co-substituted samples with LaNb0.8WxMo0.2-xO4.1 (x = 0.00, 0.02, 0.04, 0.10, 0.16, 0.18, 0.20) which exhibited the highest total conductivity at x = 0.02 in the intermediate temperature range (2.37 x 10(-3) S cm(-1) at 665 degrees C in air).
Titulo: Effect of W and Mo co-substitution on conductivity and structure of LaNbO4

Sentencas: Powder X-ray diffraction patterns showed that the tetragonal phases were able to be stabilized at room temperature when x > 0.02.
Titulo: Effect of W and Mo co-substitution on conductivity and structure of LaNbO4

Sentencas: The phase diagram obtained from variable-temperature X-ray diffraction, indicated that the modulated structures could be maintained from room temperature to 900 degrees C when x >= 0.10.
Titulo: Effect of W and Mo co-substitution on conductivity and structure of LaNbO4

Sentencas: With the combination of electrochemical impedance spectroscopy measurements and Rietveld refinements from X-ray diffraction patterns, total conductivities of these materials were found to be proportional to the volume of the unit cells.
Titulo: Effect of W and Mo co-substitution on conductivity and structure of LaNbO4

Sentencas: It is also noted that the existence of modulated structures negatively impacts the total conductivities.
Titulo: Effect of W and Mo co-substitution on conductivity and structure of LaNbO4
